Package StateMachine

Interface Summary
Call Each Command and State has a Call Object, which is called on entry for States and on process for Commands, it is able to inform an Object about the changes within the StateMachine
 

Class Summary
Command A Command is used to define the edges between the States.
State A state consists of a status, a message, a callable Call-Object which is called on entry and a Map mapping other States to Commands.
StateMachine Implements a DFA, where the edges are Commands and the vertices are States.
 

Exception Summary
StateException StateException is raised by StateMachine whenever there is no edge StateException.c from StateException.oldState
